document_data.mainbody:
Maerglor was an evil mage who lived in Elturel in the Western Heartlands some time before 1357 DR.
Maerglor bought the Shadowtome from a band of hobgoblins whod killed the mage Azkhazan in the mountains north of Iriaebor, giving them food, weapons, and quality armor in exchange. Later, Maerglor sold the book to Elminster.
